## SchemaReturnType type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SchemaReturnType<DE extends DatasourceEngine, Types extends ModelSchemaContents> = DE extends 'dynamodb' ? ModelSchema<{
    types: Types;
    authorization: [];
    configuration: any;
}> : RDSModelSchema<{
    types: Types;
    authorization: [];
    configuration: any;
}>;
```
